Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-0690 affecting package ansible for versions less than 2.17.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-0690 affecting package ansible for versions less than 2.17.0-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package ansible is earlier than 2.17.0-1, affected by CVE-2024-0690
